trans-unit.source: Provides a stream used for client-server communication that uses the Secure Socket Layer (SSL) security protocol to authenticate the server and optionally the client.
trans-unit.target: 提供一个用于客户端-服务器通信的流，该流使用安全套接字层 (SSL) 安全协议对服务器和（可选）客户端进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: SSL protocols help to provide confidentiality and integrity checking for messages transmitted using an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: SSL 协议帮助提供机密性和完整性检查传输使用的消息<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: An SSL connection, such as that provided by <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>, should be used when communicating sensitive information between a client and a server.
trans-unit.target: SSL 连接，如提供的<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>、 应时使用通信客户端和服务器之间的敏感信息。

trans-unit.source: Using an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> helps to prevent anyone from reading and tampering with information while it is in transit on the network.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>有助于防止任何人读取和在网络上传输时被篡改的信息。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance transmits data using a stream that you supply when creating the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>实例将使用在创建时提供的流的数据传输<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: When you supply this underlying stream, you have the option to specify whether closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> also closes the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 当提供此基础流时，你可以选择以指定是否关闭<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>也会关闭基础流。

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class is used with the <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient> and <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener> classes.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类用于<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>和<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A> method provides a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream> suitable for use with the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient.GetStream%2A>方法提供<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>适用于<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类。

trans-unit.source: After creating an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>, the server and optionally, the client must be authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 在创建后<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>，服务器和 （可选） 客户端必须进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The server must provide an X509 certificate that establishes proof of its identity and can request that the client also do so.
trans-unit.target: 服务器必须提供一个 X509 证书建立的标识的概念，并可以请求，客户端也会这样。

trans-unit.source: Authentication must be performed before transmitting information using an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用信息在传输之前执行身份验证<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: Clients initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which block until the authentication completes, or the asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A> methods, which do not block waiting for the authentication to complete.
trans-unit.target: 客户端启动身份验证使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法，身份验证完成之前阻止，或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>方法，不会阻止等待完成的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Servers initiate authentication using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 服务器启动身份验证使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Both client and server must initiate the authentication.
trans-unit.target: 客户端和服务器必须启动身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The authentication is handled by the Security Support Provider (SSPI) channel provider.
trans-unit.target: 安全支持提供程序 (SSPI) 通道提供程序由处理身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The client is given an opportunity to control validation of the server's certificate by specifying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate when creating an <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 客户端有机会通过指定控制的服务器的证书验证<xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>时创建的委托<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: The server can also control validation by supplying a <xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback> delegate.
trans-unit.target: 服务器还可以通过提供控制验证<xref:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback>委托。

trans-unit.source: The method referenced by the delegate includes the remote party's certificate and any errors SSPI encountered while validating the certificate.
trans-unit.target: 由委托引用的方法包括远程方的证书和 SSPI 验证证书时遇到任何错误。

trans-unit.source: Note that if the server specifies a delegate, the delegate's method is invoked regardless of whether the server requested client authentication.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否服务器指定一个委托，该委托的方法都会调用无论是否在服务器请求客户端身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the server did not request client authentication, the server's delegate method receives a null certificate and an empty array of certificate errors.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器没有请求客户端身份验证，服务器的委托方法接收 null 证书和证书错误的空数组。

trans-unit.source: If the server requires client authentication, the client must specify one or more certificates for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 如果服务器需要客户端身份验证，客户端必须指定一个或多个证书进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the client has more than one certificate, the client can provide a <xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback> delegate to select the correct certificate for the server.
trans-unit.target: 在客户端有多个证书，客户端可以提供<xref:System.Net.Security.LocalCertificateSelectionCallback>委托来选择正确的证书进行服务器。

trans-unit.source: The client's certificates must be located in the current user's "My" certificate store.
trans-unit.target: 客户端的证书必须位于当前用户的"My"证书存储区。

trans-unit.source: Client authentication via certificates is not supported for the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Ssl2> (SSL version 2) protocol.
trans-unit.target: 不支持通过证书的客户端身份验证<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Ssl2>(SSL 版本 2) 协议。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>已不再使用。

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您应关闭此对象，并删除对它的所有引用，以便它可以通过垃圾回收器收集。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication process, also known as the SSL handshake, succeeds, the identity of the server (and optionally, the client) is established and the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> can be used by the client and server to exchange messages.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证过程，也称为 SSL 握手，成功，建立服务器 （和 （可选） 客户端） 的标识和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>可以由客户端和服务器使用的消息交换。

trans-unit.source: Before sending or receiving information, the client and server should check the security services and levels provided by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> to determine whether the protocol, algorithms, and strengths selected meet their requirements for integrity and confidentiality.
trans-unit.target: 前发送或接收信息，客户端和服务器应检查的安全服务和提供的级别<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>以确定是否协议、 算法和优势选择满足他们的完整性和保密性要求。

trans-unit.source: If the current settings are not sufficient, the stream should be closed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前设置不能满足需求，应关闭流。

trans-unit.source: You can check the security services provided by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> using the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以检查提供的安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the elements that report the cryptographic settings used for authentication, encryption and data signing.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示报告用于身份验证、 加密和签名数据的加密设置的元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Members
trans-unit.target: 成员

trans-unit.source: The security protocol used to authenticate the server and, optionally, the client.
trans-unit.target: 使用服务器和客户端，（可选） 进行身份验证的安全协议。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.SslProtocol%2A>属性和关联<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The key exchange algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 密钥交换算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeAlgorithm%2A>属性和关联<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExchangeAlgorithmType>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The message integrity algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 消息完整性算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashAlgorithm%2A>属性和关联<xref:System.Security.Authentication.HashAlgorithmType>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The message confidentiality algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 消息保密性算法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A> property and the associated <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A>属性和关联<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType>枚举。

trans-unit.source: The strengths of the selected algorithms.
trans-unit.target: 所选算法的优势。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A>, and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.KeyExchangeStrength%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.HashStrength%2A>，和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherStrength%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: After a successful authentication, you can send data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证成功后，你可以将数据发送使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Write%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can receive data using the synchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A> or asynchronous <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 你可以接收的数据使用同步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.Read%2A>或异步<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginRead%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If you specified to the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A> that the underlying stream should be left open, you are responsible for closing that stream when you are done using it.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定给<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>基础流应保持打开状态，你将负责完成后关闭该流使用它。

trans-unit.source: If the application that creates the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> object runs with the credentials of a Normal user, the application will not be able to access certificates installed in the local machine store unless permission has been explicitly given to the user to do so.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序，创建<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>对象使用的普通用户凭据运行，应用程序将无法访问证书安装在本地计算机存储区中，除非权限已显式提供给用户若要这样做。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> assumes that a timeout along with any other <xref:System.IO.IOException> when one is thrown from the inner stream will be treated as fatal by its caller.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> 假定以及任何其他超时<xref:System.IO.IOException>一个从内部流的引发时将被视为致命由其调用方。

trans-unit.source: Reusing a <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance after a timeout will return garbage.
trans-unit.target: 重用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>实例后超时将返回垃圾回收。

trans-unit.source: An application should <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A> the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> and throw an exception in these cases.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序应<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A><xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>和在这些情况下引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.6 includes a new security feature that blocks insecure cipher and hashing algorithms for connections.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.6 包括一个新的安全功能，将阻止不安全的密码和哈希算法的连接。

trans-unit.source: Applications using TLS/SSL through APIs such as HttpClient, HttpWebRequest, FTPClient, SmtpClient, SslStream, etc. and targeting .NET Framework 4.6 get the more-secure behavior by default.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，使用 TLS/SSL 通过例如 HttpClient、 HttpWebRequest、 FTPClient、 SmtpClient、 SslStream 等的 Api 和面向.NET Framework 4.6 的应用程序获得更安全行为。

trans-unit.source: Developers may want to opt out of this behavior in order to maintain interoperability with their existing SSL3 services OR TLS w/ RC4 services.
trans-unit.target: 开发人员可能想要选择退出此行为以便保持其现有 SSL3 服务或 TLS 带 RC4 服务与互操作性。

trans-unit.source: [This article](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494) explains how to modify your code so that the new behavior is disabled.
trans-unit.target: [这篇文章](https://support.microsoft.com/kb/3069494)说明如何修改你的代码，以便禁用新的行为。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework 4.7 adds new overloads for the methods that authenticate SslStreams that do not specify a TLS version, but instead use the TLS version defined as the system default in [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx).
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 4.7 将添加新的重载的方法的身份验证不指定 TLS 版本，但改为使用 TLS 版本定义中的系统默认值为 SslStreams [SCHANNEL](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/aa380123.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Use these methods in your app as a way to be able to later modify the defaults as TLS version best practice changes over time, without the need to rebuild and redeploy your app.
trans-unit.target: 作为一种方法能够随着时间推移，TLS 版本最佳做法更改为更高版本修改的默认值在应用中使用这些方法而无需重新生成并重新部署你的应用程序。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpListener>使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类与客户端通信。

trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建<xref:System.Net.Sockets.TcpClient>使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类与服务器进行通信。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: To prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from closing the stream that you supply, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>关闭你提供的流，使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象，<see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 使用此对象发送和接收数据。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置文件中为 encryptionpolicy，未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>默认为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>为<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>构造的实例。

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Null 加密的使用时是必需的加密策略设置为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="innerStream" /> is not readable.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 不可读。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 不可写。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="innerStream" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 对象，<see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 使用此对象发送和接收数据。

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value that indicates the closure behavior of the <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> object used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> for sending and receiving data.
trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，它指示 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 用来发送和接收数据的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 对象的封闭行为。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates if the inner stream is left open.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指示内部流是否保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> and stream closure behavior.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 和流封闭行为初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 当指定`true`为`leaveStreamOpen`参数，关闭<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>不起任何作用`innerStream`流式传输; 您必须显式关闭`innerStream`当不再需要它。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置文件中为 encryptionpolicy，未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>默认为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>为<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>构造的实例。

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Null 加密的使用时是必需的加密策略设置为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.target: 一个布尔值，它指示 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 用来发送和接收数据的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 对象的封闭行为。

trans-unit.source: This parameter indicates if the inner stream is left open.
trans-unit.target: 此参数指示内部流是否保持打开状态。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback" /> delegate responsible for validating the certificate supplied by the remote party.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.RemoteCertificateValidationCallback" /> 委托，负责验证远程方提供的证书。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" />, stream closure behavior and certificate validation delegate.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />、流关闭行为和证书验证委托初始化 <see cref="T:System.IO.Stream" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: When you specify `true` for the `leaveStreamOpen` parameter, closing the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> has no effect on the `innerStream` stream; you must explicitly close `innerStream` when you no longer need it.
trans-unit.target: 当指定`true`为`leaveStreamOpen`参数，关闭<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>不起任何作用`innerStream`流式传输; 您必须显式关闭`innerStream`当不再需要它。

trans-unit.source: The `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's `certificateErrors` argument contains any Windows error codes returned by the channel Security Support Provider Interface (SSPI).
trans-unit.target: `userCertificateValidationCallback`委托的`certificateErrors`参数中包含的任何返回的通道安全支持提供程序接口 (SSPI) 的 Windows 错误代码。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the method invoked by the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate determines whether authentication succeeds.
trans-unit.target: 由调用的方法的返回值`userCertificateValidationCallback`委托确定身份验证是否成功。

trans-unit.source: The security protocol and cryptographic algorithms are already selected when the `userCertificateValidationCallback` delegate's method is invoked.
trans-unit.target: 安全协议和加密算法包已选择时`userCertificateValidationCallback`调用委托的方法。

trans-unit.source: You can use the method to determine whether the selected cryptographic algorithms and strengths are sufficient for your application.
trans-unit.target: 该方法可用于确定所选的加密算法和优势是否能够满足你的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: If not, the method should return `false` to prevent the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> from being created.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`以防止<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>从正在创建。

trans-unit.source: If a value is not specified in the configuration file for encryptionpolicy, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> defaults to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType> for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance that is constructed.
trans-unit.target: 如果在配置文件中为 encryptionpolicy，未指定值<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>默认为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.RequireEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>为<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>构造的实例。

trans-unit.source: The use of the Null cipher is required when the encryption policy is set to <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Null 加密的使用时是必需的加密策略设置为<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The Framework caches SSL sessions as they are created and attempts to reuse a cached session for a new request, if possible.
trans-unit.target: 框架缓存 SSL 会话，因为它们创建，并尝试尽可能重用为新请求，缓存的会话。

trans-unit.source: When attempting to reuse an SSL session, the Framework uses the first element of <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> (if there is one), or tries to reuse an anonymous sessions if <xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A> is empty.
trans-unit.target: 当尝试重复使用的 SSL 会话，框架将使用的第一个元素<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>（如果没有一个），或尝试重用匿名会话，如果<xref:System.Net.HttpWebRequest.ClientCertificates%2A>为空。

trans-unit.source: Client certificates are not supported in the SSL version 2 protocol.
trans-unit.target: 客户端证书不支持 SSL 版本 2 协议中。

trans-unit.source: Authenticate the client side of a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 对客户端-服务器连接的客户端进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: The name of the server that shares this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 共享此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 的服务器名称。

trans-unit.source: Called by clients to authenticate the server and optionally the client in a client-server connection.
trans-unit.target: 由客户端调用，以对服务器或客户端服务器连接中的客户端（可选）进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] No client certificates are used in the authentication.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[sslprotocols-none](~/includes/sslprotocols-none-md.md)] 任何客户端证书身份验证中不使用。

trans-unit.source: The certificate revocation list is not checked during authentication.
trans-unit.target: 不会在身份验证过程检查证书吊销列表。

trans-unit.source: The value specified for `targetHost` must match the name on the server's certificate.
trans-unit.target: 为指定的值`targetHost`上服务器的证书的名称必须匹配。

trans-unit.source: When authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，并且此<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>已不再使用。

trans-unit.source: Checking the list negatively impacts performance but improves application security.
trans-unit.target: 在列表中检查产生负面影响性能，但可以提高应用程序安全性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that identifies the bulk encryption algorithm used by this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值确定此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 使用的批量加密算法。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> is required for the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A> property when the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption> enumeration value is used to construct a <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance.
trans-unit.target: 值为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null>需要<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.CipherAlgorithm%2A>属性时<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy.NoEncryption>枚举值用于构造<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>实例。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)] do not support the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> value.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[winxpsvr](~/includes/winxpsvr-md.md)] 和[!INCLUDE[winxp](~/includes/winxp-md.md)]不支持<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null>值。

trans-unit.source: So even if the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> value is used to construct the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> instance, the <xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy> property will be <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.None>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，即使<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null>值用于构造<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>实例，<xref:System.Net.Security.EncryptionPolicy>属性将为<xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.None>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> value is only returned on Windows Vista and later.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.CipherAlgorithmType.Null> Windows Vista 及更高版本，才返回值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 <see langword="true" />；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>引用。

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose()` 方法。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="Dispose" /> can be called multiple times by other objects.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="Dispose" /> 可以由其他对象多次调用。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" /> be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to <see langword="Dispose" />.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象<see langword="Dispose" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to implement <see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />, see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关如何实现详细信息<see langword="Dispose(Boolean)" />，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about <see langword="Dispose" /> and <see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息<see langword="Dispose" />和<see cref="M:System.Object.Finalize" />，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> instance returned by a call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" />.
trans-unit.target: 调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" /> 后返回的 <see cref="T:System.IAsyncResult" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Ends a pending asynchronous server authentication operation started with a previous call to <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" />.
trans-unit.target: 结束通过以前调用 <see cref="Overload:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer" /> 而启动的、处于挂起状态的异步服务器身份验证操作。

trans-unit.source: If the operation has not completed, this method blocks until it does.
trans-unit.target: 如果该操作未完成，此方法阻止，直至它执行。

trans-unit.source: When the authentication succeeds, you must check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A> and <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A> properties to determine what security services are used by the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 当身份验证成功时，必须检查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsEncrypted%2A>和<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsSigned%2A>属性来确定由哪些安全服务<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: Check the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A> property to determine whether mutual authentication occurred.
trans-unit.target: 检查<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.IsMutuallyAuthenticated%2A>属性以确定是否发生了相互身份验证。

trans-unit.source: If the authentication fails, you receive a <xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>, and this <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is no longer useable.
trans-unit.target: 如果身份验证失败，你收到<xref:System.Security.Authentication.AuthenticationException>，并且此<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>已不再使用。

trans-unit.source: You should close this object and remove all references to it so that it can be collected by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 您应关闭此对象，并删除对它的所有引用，以便它可以通过垃圾回收器收集。

trans-unit.target: 若要以同步方式执行此操作，请使用之一<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> value that indicates whether this <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> uses data encryption.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.Boolean" /> 值，该值指示此 <see cref="T:System.Net.Security.SslStream" /> 是否使用数据加密。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if data is encrypted before being transmitted over the network and decrypted when it reaches the remote endpoint; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果在通过网络传输数据前将其加密，并在数据到达远程终结点后将其解密，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Encryption helps to protect the privacy of the data, namely it helps to ensure that while data is in transit, it cannot be deciphered by third parties.
trans-unit.target: 加密有助于保护的数据的隐私，即它可帮助确保，在传输过程中的数据时，它不能破译由第三方。

trans-unit.source: Shuts down this SslStream.
trans-unit.target: 关闭此 SslStream。

trans-unit.source: The task object representing the asynchronous operation.
trans-unit.target: 表示异步操作的任务对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates the security protocol used to authenticate this connection.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示用于对此连接进行身份验证的安全协议。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols" /> value that represents the protocol used for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 代表用于身份验证的协议的 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The supported security protocols are specified when the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> is created.
trans-unit.target: 指定的受支持的安全协议时<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>创建。

trans-unit.source: If no security protocol was passed to the constructor, the instance is created using <xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Default>.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有安全协议已传递给构造函数中，使用创建实例<xref:System.Security.Authentication.SslProtocols.Default>。

trans-unit.source: The actual protocol used for authentication is selected based on the protocols supported by the client and server.
trans-unit.target: 根据客户端和服务器支持的协议，用于身份验证的实际协议处于选中状态。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the security properties of the specified stream.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示了指定的流的安全属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Net.TransportContext" /> used for authentication using extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于采用扩展保护的身份验证的 <see cref="T:System.Net.TransportContext" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.TransportContext" /> object that contains the channel binding token (CBT) used for extended protection.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.TransportContext" /> 对象，它包含用于扩展保护的通道绑定令牌 (CBT)。

trans-unit.source: Writes data to this stream.
trans-unit.target: 将数据写入此流。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that supplies the bytes written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，该数组提供要写入流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: Writes the specified data to this stream.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的数据写入此流。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当在操作完成时，将阻止此方法。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking while the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止阻塞操作完成时，使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 你已成功通过身份验证之前，不能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 进行身份验证的调用一个<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类不支持多个同时进行的写入操作。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates writing to an authenticated <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何写入经过身份验证的<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The write operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 写操作失败。

trans-unit.source: There is already a write operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: 已存在一个正在执行的写操作。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: 未进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> array that supplies the bytes written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 数组，该数组提供要写入流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the zero-based location in <c>buffer</c> at which to begin reading bytes to be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，它包含 <c>buffer</c> 中从零开始的位置，从该位置开始读取要写入流中的字节。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that contains the number of bytes to read from <c>buffer</c>.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，包含要从 <c>buffer</c> 中读取的字节数。

trans-unit.source: Write the specified number of <see cref="T:System.Byte" />s to the underlying stream using the specified buffer and offset.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的缓冲区和偏移将指定数目的 <see cref="T:System.Byte" /> 写入基础流。

trans-unit.source: This method blocks while the operation completes.
trans-unit.target: 当在操作完成时，将阻止此方法。

trans-unit.source: To prevent blocking while the operation completes the operation completes, use the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要防止在操作完成的操作完成后，使用<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginWrite%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You cannot call this method until you have successfully authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 你已成功通过身份验证之前，不能调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: To authenticate call one of the <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>, or <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 进行身份验证的调用一个<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsClient%2A>，或<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsClient%2A>， <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.AuthenticateAsServer%2A>，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.BeginAuthenticateAsServer%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream> class does not support multiple simultaneous write operations.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream>类不支持多个同时进行的写入操作。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="buffer" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="buffer" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> <paramref name="<" /> <paramref name="0" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="-or-" /><paramref name="offset" /> > the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="-or-" /><paramref name="offset" /> > <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="offset" /> + count > the length of <paramref name="buffer" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="offset" /> + count > <paramref name="buffer" /> 的长度。

trans-unit.source: The write operation failed.
trans-unit.target: 写操作失败。

trans-unit.source: There is already a write operation in progress.
trans-unit.target: 已存在一个正在执行的写操作。

trans-unit.source: This object has been closed.
trans-unit.target: 此对象已关闭。

trans-unit.source: Authentication has not occurred.
trans-unit.target: 未进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the amount of time a write operation blocks waiting for data.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置写操作阻止等待数据的时间。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Int32" /> that specifies the amount of time that elapses before a synchronous write operation fails.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Int32" />，指定同步写操作失败前经过的时间。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the value returned by invoking <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回通过调用返回的值<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>对基础流。

trans-unit.source: For set operations, the specified value sets the <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A> value on the underlying stream.
trans-unit.target: 对于集合运算指定的值设置<xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteTimeout%2A>对基础流的值。

trans-unit.source: If the underlying stream is a <xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>, <xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.WriteTimeout%2A> is in milliseconds and is set to <xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite> by default so that write operations do not timeout.
trans-unit.target: 如果基础流已<xref:System.Net.Sockets.NetworkStream>，<xref:System.Net.Security.SslStream.WriteTimeout%2A>以毫秒为单位并将设置为<xref:System.Threading.Timeout.Infinite>默认情况下，因此，编写操作就不会超时。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates setting the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何设置此属性的值。
